translation.note: droplist choice - Even parity
translation.variant: Pari

translation.note: droplist choice - Odd parity
translation.variant: Dispari

translation.note: droplist choice - No parity
translation.variant: Nessuno

section.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a reference name was automatically changed during a copy/paste.
translation.variant: Il nome di riferimento del nodo importato è già in uso da parte di un altro nodo. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo nome di riferimento univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a site number was automatically changed during a copy/paste.
translation.variant: Il numero del sito importato è già in uso da parte di un altro sito. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo numero di sito univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a network number was automatically changed during a copy/paste.
translation.variant: Il numero di rete importato è già in uso da parte di un'altra rete. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo numero di rete univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a device id was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: L'ID del dispositivo importato è già in uso da parte di un altro dispositivo. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo ID di dispositivo univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a machine address was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: L'indirizzo pubblico del dispositivo importato è già in uso da parte di un altro dispositivo. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo indirizzo di dispositivo univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a machine address was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: L'indirizzo del dispositivo importato è già in uso da parte di un altro dispositivo. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo indirizzo di dispositivo univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that an equipment instance number was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: il numero di istanza dell'attrezzatura importato è già in uso da parte di un'altra attrezzatura. È stato creato automaticamente un nuovo numero di istanza univoco.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates a mismatch between a device and a piece of equipment during an import.
translation.variant: Il controller importato ha eseguito un tentativo di assegnazione a se stesso un programma di controllo già assegnato ad un controller differente. Il programma di controllo non è stato riassegnato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indication of an attempt to assign a non-existent equipment to a device.
translation.variant: Il controller importato ha eseguito un tentativo di assegnazione a se stesso di un programma di controllo inesistente. Per assegnare il programma di controllo specificato, è necessario esportarlo dallo stesso database a cui appartiene il controller, quindi importarlo in questo database.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an attempt to assign an equipment to a non-existent device.
translation.variant: Il programma di controllo importato ha eseguito un tentativo di assegnazione a se stesso di un controller inesistente. Per assegnare il programma di controllo specificato, è necessario esportare il controller dallo stesso database a cui appartiene il programma di controllo, quindi importarlo in questo database.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - error trying to set an equipment parameter
translation.variant: Impossibile impostare un parametro del programma di controllo. In genere, questo problema si verifica perché il programma di controllo non è stato ricaricato durante l'importazione o prima dell'esportazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error with a report parameter due to a problem with a control program during a database import or export.
translation.variant: Impossibile impostare un parametro del rapporto. In genere, questo problema si verifica perché il programma di controllo non è stato ricaricato durante l'importazione o prima dell'esportazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indication of an error trying to assign a schedule group
translation.variant: Il nodo specificato non è stato assegnato ad un gruppo di Schedule perché il gruppo non esiste. È necessario configurare manualmente tutti i gruppi di Schedule nel database importato e in quello esportato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a reporting action
translation.variant: Non è stata eseguita l'assegnazione ad un' azione dei rapporti perché l'azione non esiste. È necessario configurare manualmente tutte le azioni dei rapporti nel database importato e in quello esportato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to set up source nodes due to a non-existent source tree
translation.variant: Importazione dei nodi di origine non riuscita. Impossibile trovare la struttura di origine. È necessario aggiungere manualmente le strutture di origine e configurare le regole nel database importato e in quello esportato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a source parent location problem.
translation.variant: Impossibile definire il sito del programma di controllo perché non è stato assegnato ad un dispositivo. Il programma di controllo è stato assegnato alla directory principale della struttura di origine.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a source parent node. Parent node was not found.
translation.variant: Assegnazione del nodo di origine principale non riuscita. Impossibile trovare l'origine nel database importato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a source rule.
translation.variant: Errore di una regola di origine. È necessario aggiungere manualmente le strutture di origine e configurare le regole nel database importato e in quello esportato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indication of an error with an operator or group due to a problem encountered during a database import.
translation.variant: Impossibile trovare un operatore o un gruppo di operatori di riferimento. Per correggere l'errore, aggiungere l'operatore o il gruppo di operatori mancanti, quindi eseguire di nuovo l'importazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indication of an error with a missing role encountered during a database import.
translation.variant: Impossibile trovare un ruolo. Per correggere l'errore, aggiungere il ruolo mancante, quindi eseguire di nuovo l'importazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with a privilege being invalid for this database version.
translation.variant: Impossibile mantenere un privilegio perché non è pertinente alla versione in uso. Ciò non dovrebbe provocare problemi.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with a user preference being invalid for this database version.
translation.variant: Impossibile mantenere una preferenza utente perché non è pertinente alla versione in uso. Ciò non dovrebbe provocare problemi.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with a missing category during a database import
translation.variant: È stata aggiunta una categoria di viste mancante. Questo evento si verifica quando una vista nel database importato contiene una categoria non inclusa nel database esistente. Accedere alla pagina relativa alla categoria dei grafici o delle proprietà nel Config Tree.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with adding a category that was previously missing.
translation.variant: Aggiunta di una categoria di viste mancante non riuscita. Non verranno aggiunte le viste relative alla posizione specificata.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error attaching a view to a node during a database import
translation.variant: Tentativo di allegare una vista non riuscito. Questo evento si verifica quando il file della vista utilizzato dal database importato è inesistente. Sostituire il file .view mancante, quindi allegarlo di nuovo al nodo.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error when adding a default view due to a non-existent child node.
translation.variant: Aggiunta delle viste predefinite ad un componente child del programma di controllo non riuscito perché non è stato trovato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign an equipment. The equipment is not allowed to be assigned to that particular device.
translation.variant: Il programma di controllo importato non può essere assegnato al controller perché non è valido per il dispositivo specificato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error assigning the group-cache to a device because it doesn't exist.
translation.variant: Il dispositivo cache di gruppo specificato non è valido. Le impostazioni del sito sono state modificate per non utilizzare la cache di gruppo. È consigliabile risolvere il problema al termine dell'importazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where an imported site or router has been configured for NAT, but the system does not have NAT enabled.
translation.variant: NAT non è abilitato per il sistema; tuttavia, un sito o un router importato presentano informazioni di configurazione NAT. È consigliabile abilitare NAT al termine dell'importazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where an imported router has been configured for NAT, but it's site does not have NAT for devices enabled.
translation.variant: Il router importato presenta un indirizzo NAT; tuttavia, le impostazioni del sito non indicano che i relativi indirizzi sono protetti da una configurazione NAT. È consigliabile abilitare NAT per i dispositivi al termine dell'importazione.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where hierarchical servers is not enabled for this system, but the clipping contains hierarchical server data.
translation.variant: I server gerarchici sono disabilitati. Il collegamento al server non è stato importato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where the clipping contains a server link, but the system is a child hierarchical server and therefore does not allow server links.
translation.variant: Non sono consentiti collegamenti ai server per i server secondari della gerarchia.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where the clipping contains a navigation link, but the system is a parent hierarchical server and therefore does not allow navigation links.
translation.variant: Non sono consentiti collegamenti di navigazione per i server principali della gerarchia.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where a file is missing that might be needed to correctly paste the system fragment at a later time.
translation.variant: Manca un file richiesto. È possibile che l'importazione non riesca.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where the device in the clipping could not be imported as it was into the target database. The device type was changed before being imported.
translation.variant: Il tipo di dispositivo è stato modificato durante l'importazione. Sarà necessario eseguire uno scaricamento.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a conflict was resolved by updating the CCN/IP connection CCN gateway address to the address of the gateway being imported.
translation.variant: L'indirizzo del gateway CCN della connessione CCN/IP è stato modificato.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem that the import process could not update the CCN/IP Connection's CCN Gateway address to match the imported gateway. Further action is required by the user.
translation.variant: Il gateway CCN è stato importato ma non è stato possibile aggiornare l'indirizzo del gateway CCN di connessione CCN/IP. Aggiornarlo manualmente.

short day name for Monday
translation.variant: Lun

short day name for Tuesday
translation.variant: Mar

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Wednesday
translation.variant: Mer

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Thursday
translation.variant: Gio

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Friday
translation.variant: Ven

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Saturday
translation.variant: Sab

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Sunday
translation.variant: Dom

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
For any day of the week
translation.variant: Qualsiasi
